body:
Initially we saw the drop in users in Activity Stream:
https://sql.telemetry.mozilla.org/queries/27149#93513

I've confirmed similar drops in Onboarding:
https://sql.telemetry.mozilla.org/queries/38610#103685

And Search:
https://sql.telemetry.mozilla.org/queries/38635#103758
